DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effectiveness Lactobacillus reuteri DSM17938 supplementation infantile colic Indonesian infant .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Probiotic Supplementation Crying Time Infantile Colic
DOC.detailed_description: Infantile colic problem face many parent caregiver . There evidence medication help situation . The etiology infantile colic still unknown . Lactobacillus reuteri show five study reduce cry time infant diagnose infantile colic .
DOC.criteria: otherwise healthy infant Infantile colic accord Roe IV criterion Full term infant Birth weight 2500 4000g Exclusively breast milk partially breastfed Mothers last education degree Senior high school Exclusion Criteria Clinically suspect allergy Consumption probiotic , antibiotic , PPI Failure thrive
